Morgan St, MC 152, Chicago, IL, 60607    Office Phone:  (312) 413-9267    Email:  mtheys@uic.edu      Office Hours   Spring  2020 Semester - Spring 2020 Semester     Sunday        Monday        Tuesday  12:30pm – 01:30pm  SEO 941      Wednesday        Thursday  12:30pm – 01:30pm  SEO 941      Friday        Saturday            About   Research:  I am currently interested in Improving the Undergraduate Experience.  If you are interested in working with me please send me a note. I am not currently looking for any students, but if you have a good idea, or if your interests align with mine, there may be some opportunities.  A current vita is available upon request. If you have questions or comments, please feel free to send me an email.
